comments.html: I'm glad you caught that non-integration, Ivan. Ideally NSX (or Hyper-V or AHV or whatever you're using) should transparently offload to a smart NIC. I don't think it would necessarily require an acquisition but it would require a lot of engineering work and for one of the parties to put their ego aside (I don't want to buy two control planes/control panels, sorry).
comments.name: Wes Felter
